text:
i've been working with clawdbot for 1 week, and here is my take 

-overrated? definitely not.
-everyone needs it? probably not.

quick background: i've already been building towards this: personalOS / ai-assistant vision.

both with internal slack notifications for literally

Las skills son maravillosas para este tipo de flujos.

Le puedes pedir al propio clawdbot que con lo que ha aprendido de la interacción genere una skill para que sea replicable.

Quizá te estoy contando cosas que ya sabes , pero a mí me está resultando muy útil crear skills

Yesterday I tried using 
@moltbot
  (aka. Clawdbot)
and honestly… I couldn’t understand anything 
Got frustrated and ended up starting to build a GUI

The CLI is just too hard
Even changing a simple setting means reading the docs over and over

At some point I thought:
“Why

clawdbot虽然安全上全是筛子，但至少保留了全局整合和数据所有权。
manus既不全局整合，也不含所有权。
高下立判。
Moltbot (ex-Clawdbot) : Pourquoi il faut se méfier de cet assistant personnel qui prend le contrôle de votre vie numérique
